ResourceOrder.description: A Resource Order is a request to provision a set of Resources (logical and physical) triggered by the request to provision a Service through a Service Order

category.description: Used to categorize the order from a business perspective that can be useful for the OM system.

completionDate.description: Date when the order was completed

correlationId.description: ID given by the consumer and only understandable by him (to facilitate his searches afterwards)

description.description: free-text description of the Resource Order

id.description: Identifier of an instance of the Resource Order. Required to be unique within the resource type.  Used in URIs as the identifier for specific instances of a type.

name.description: A string used to give a name to the Resource Order

orderDate.description: Date when the order was created

priority.description: A way that can be used by consumers to prioritize orders in OM system (from 0 to 4 : 0 is the highest priority, and 4 the lowest)

requestedCompletionDate.description: Requested delivery date from the requestor perspective

requestedStartDate.description: Order start date wished by the requestor

state.description: The life cycle state of the resource.

orderType.description: Name of the Resource Order type
